description: Papagroup, established in 2018, is a technology company on cross-platform applications for both outsourcing and production. Papagroup works to create not only software but also solutions for a better life.
2018:
Establish company. 
Open the first office
2020: Join the in-game industry by establishing Papa Studio
2021: Open Papa Academy to educate and training learners from both inside and outside company
2022:
Establish new office in HCM city. 
Do the first steps towards becoming a global company.
